General.Name: Jiangsu Zhongtian Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Zhongtian Technology Co., Ltd. produces and sells electrical machinery and equipment for the communications, electric power, marine, new energy, marine engineering construction, and other business sectors in China and internationally. It provides telecommunication products, including PON, optical fiber cables, Fttx, coaxial cables, and antennas; submarine cables, submarine fiber optic cables, EPIC, submarine cable accessories, and marine and offshore cables; and precision equipment, including optical fiber and optical cable machines. The company also offers hardware fittings, insulators, arresters, OPGW, conductors, aluminum-clad steel wires, transformers, and power switch gears, as well as LV, MV, and HV power cables; lithium-ion batteries, solar cell back sheets, and photovoltaic technology; and new materials and components, including 3D printing, supercapacitors, open cell aluminum foam, and polyimide films. In addition, it engages in the engineering, procurement, and construction activities; and non-ferrous metal trading and other business activities. Jiangsu Zhongtian Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Nantong, the People's Republic of China.
